notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Draw Fischer projections for the two D aldoheptoses whose stereochemistry at C3, C4, C5, and C6 is the same as that of D-glucose at C2, C3, C4, and C5.
